targets.queryText:
WITH ranked_data AS (
    SELECT
        strftime('%s', Zeitpunkt) AS timeline,
        Bruttopreis,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Zeitpunkt) AS x -- x-Wert als Rang
    FROM strompreise
    WHERE
        Zeitpunkt >= datetime('now', '-7 days', 'localtime') AND
        Zeitpunkt <= datetime('now', 'localtime')
),
stats AS (
    SELECT
        COUNT(*) AS N,
        SUM(x) AS sum_x,
        SUM(Bruttopreis) AS sum_y,
        SUM(x * Bruttopreis) AS sum_xy,
        SUM(x * x) AS sum_x2
    FROM ranked_data
),
regression AS (
    SELECT
        (N * sum_xy - sum_x * sum_y) / (N * sum_x2 - sum_x * sum_x) AS slope,
        (sum_y - (N * sum_xy - sum_x * sum_y) / (N * sum_x2 - sum_x * sum_x) * sum_x) / N AS intercept
    FROM stats
)
SELECT
    timeline,
    Bruttopreis,
    (slope * x + intercept) AS trendline -- Trendlinie berechnen
FROM ranked_data, regression
ORDER BY timeline;

        Bruttopreis,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Zeitpunkt) AS x -- x-Wert als Rang

stats AS (

        SUM(x) AS sum_x,
        SUM(Bruttopreis) AS sum_y,

regression AS (

    FROM stats
)
SELECT
    timeline,
    Bruttopreis,
    (slope * x + intercept) AS trendline -- Trendlinie berechnen
FROM ranked_data, regression
ORDER BY timeline;
